questions.question_text: Which of the following groups is MOST important to involve in the development of information security procedures?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D. Operational units are the groups that will be directly implementing and following the information security procedures on a daily basis. Their involvement ensures that the procedures are practical, relevant to the specific operations of the organization, and that they integrate smoothly into existing workflows. It also helps foster buy-in and compliance from those who will be most affected by the procedures.

questions.question_text: Which of the following would be MOST useful to determine the current status of an information security program's maturity level?
